title: Compass Wear Watch
summary: Check the right course with Compass Wear Watch - application for your watch!
description: Perfect app for Android Wear watch and mobile phone.This simple, useful application allows to take the right course no matter where you exactly are.Now the only thing you need is your own mobile phone and Android Wear watch! Virtual compass is a navigation instrument quite realistically imitating the physical device, which shows four cardinal directions. Application finds your actual position and determine all geographical directions. Aesthetic design of this sleek compass won’t distract from your priorities and will helps globetrotters to guide throughout many exciting adventures! This utility shows not only North, South, East and West but also the azimuth and angle. We recommend this user-friendly application for all of those people who spend their spare time outside.
descriptionHTML:
Perfect app for Android Wear watch and mobile phone.

This simple, useful application allows to take the right course no matter where you exactly are.

Now the only thing you need is your own mobile phone and Android Wear watch! Virtual compass is a navigation instrument quite realistically imitating the physical device, which shows four cardinal directions. Application finds your actual position and determine all geographical directions. Aesthetic design of this sleek compass won’t distract from your priorities and will helps globetrotters to guide throughout many exciting adventures! This utility shows not only North, South, East and West but also the azimuth and angle. We recommend this user-friendly application for all of those people who spend their spare time outside.
